title: People don't bother to read the preseason changelog
body:
Then they complain about the "unlisted changes".

Listen here, you little shits.

I know it must fracture your skull to process even a single letter, but changelogs and massive preseason updates are not new. It's your own goddamn fault for not paying attention when the client downloads a big ass patch, then you have to go through their TOS box twice, then the new login screen, then the popup window once you login, then the various banners that mention the preseason update.

I know California Cannatonic was legalized just yesterday, but come the fuck on. You could not possibly have forgotten how to read.
